statements: DELETE FROM StudentBehaviorMonitoring WHERE intervention_needed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM StudentBehaviorMonitoring WHERE student_id = 123 AND intervention_needed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM StudentBehaviorMonitoring WHERE behavior_type = 'disruptive' AND engagement_score < 50;
DELETE FROM StudentBehaviorMonitoring WHERE student_id = 456 AND behavior_type = 'absent' AND intervention_needed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM student_behavior WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM student_behavior WHERE behavior_date < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM interventions WHERE intervention_type = 'academic' AND intervention_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE class_id = 101);
DELETE FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_score < 60);
DELETE FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_due_date < CURDATE() AND assignment_score = 0;
DELETE FROM Courses WHERE course_end_date < CURDATE();
